title: Telephone Talk
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
description: Underneath a T-shaped canopy with MT logo on top, a young man and woman talk on two telephones; man wearing overcoat, red tie, hat; woman wearing rose colored coat, carries white bag; rectangular base with gilded decoration .
name: Figure
